T02D2737:123b-1: bhatt'a r'a ka a'a ry'a ba lo ke te shva
T02D2737:123b-2: ree ka da sha mu kha sya s'a dha nam
T02D2737:124a-0: rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug @124a * //
T02D2737:124a-1: zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2737:124a-2: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2737:124a-3: lte ba zla bas rnam brgyan padma la //
T02D2737:124a-4: 'bar ba'i rgyan mnga' kun nas mun sel cing //
T02D2737:124a-5: kha ba'i ri 'dra ri dags lpags 'dzin pa //
T02D2737:124a-6: 'dzum bcas bzhugs la spyi bos btud byas te//
T02D2737:124a-7: 'gro ba de yi gnas thob 'dod pas 'dir //
T02D2737:124a-8: sgrub thabs cho ga bdag gis dran par bya //
T02D2737:124a-9: dang por re zhig gang yang rung ba'i yid dang
T02D2737:124a-10: rjes su mthun pa'i gnas legs par byugs la dri
T02D2737:124a-11: zhim po'i me tog kun tu gtor la /
T02D2737:124a-12: de'i dbus su stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D2737:124a-13: rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam zhing /
T02D2737:124a-14: de'i steng du dro ba rnams kyi bzhi ba me'i
T02D2737:124a-15: bu la brten pa nga ro bzhi pas kun nas
T02D2737:124a-16: mnan zhing gzhon nu ma'i nu mas brgyan par blta'o
T02D2737:124a-17: // de nas sa bon gyi yi ge las 'od
T02D2737:124a-18: zer rnams byung bas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang
T02D2737:124a-20: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan drangs te /
T02D2737:124a-21: de dag gi mdun nyid du phyag 'tshal ba sngon du song bas /
T02D2737:124a-22: aom badzra aargham a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-23: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-24: aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-25: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-26: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-27: aom badzra ni wi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-28: aom badzra g'i ti a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2737:124a-29: zhes byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs phul la /
T02D2737:124a-30: gang yang bdag gis dus kun du //
T02D2737:124a-31: sdig par bgyis pa gang gyur pa //
T02D2737:124a-33: deng nas brtsams te 'byung mi bgyid //
T02D2737:124a-34: dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang //
T02D2737:124a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2737:124a-36: thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D2737:124a-37: de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing //
T02D2737:124a-38: dam pa'i skyabs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2737:124a-42: btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rim gyis mngon du byas la /
T02D2737:124a-43: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2737:124a-44: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rang rang
T02D2737:124a-45: gi de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' bas rnam par
T02D2737:124a-47: bdag kyang rnam par dag par bsams la /
T02D2737:124b-0: yang aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra @124b sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2737:124b-1: kun nas stong pa nyid du bdag nyid kyang bsam mo //
T02D2737:124b-2: de'i rjes la mdun du pam las padma 'dab ma sna tshogs pa bsam zhing /
T02D2737:124b-3: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2737:124b-4: de'i dbus su yang sa bon gyi yi ge de nyid do //
T02D2737:124b-5: de nas yang de las 'od zer byung ba rnams
T02D2737:124b-6: kyis 'gro ba rnams rnam par dag par byas nas
T02D2737:124b-7: 'ongs pa dang / de nyid la zhugs pas padma
T02D2737:124b-8: 'dab ma brgyad pa gser btso ma lta bur gyur
T02D2737:124b-10: de'i dbus su yang sa bon gyi yi ge de nyid do //
T02D2737:124b-11: de nas yang de las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu dang /
T02D2737:124b-12: zhags pa lta bu byung bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bkug ste /
T02D2737:124b-13: bdag nyid dang gcig pas de la thim par blta'o //
T02D2737:124b-14: de ma thag tu padma sa bon dang bcas pa
T02D2737:124b-15: yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan
T02D2737:124b-16: ras gzigs zhal bcu gcig pa gangs ri'i rtse mo
T02D2737:124b-17: la nyi mas brgyan pa ltar dkar ba sku'i yan
T02D2737:124b-18: lag rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa nor bus spras
T02D2737:124b-20: ras bzang pos sku'i smad g-yogs pa /
T02D2737:124b-21: ri dags kyi pags pas nu ma g-yon pa bkab pa /
T02D2737:124b-22: ral pa dmar ser 'khyugs pas mdzes pa /
T02D2737:124b-29: dbu rgyan rtse bran gyis gsal bar byas pa /
T02D2737:124b-30: 'od zer dkar pos kun nas bskor ba /
T02D2737:124b-32: spyan dkyus ring zhing dpral ba yangs pa /
T02D2737:124b-34: rtsa ba'i zhal kun nas dkar ba /
T02D2737:124b-37: zhal thams cad kun nas 'dzum pa'i nyams can /
T02D2737:124b-40: g-yon dkar po de'i dbus dmar po /
T02D2737:124b-42: g-yon ljang gus bye brag rnams so //
T02D2737:124b-43: de'i steng du zhal rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs pa /
T02D2737:124b-44: nag po mche ba snang ba /
T02D2737:124b-46: spyan gsum pa ral pa bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2737:124b-47: de'i spyi bor ban du ka'i me tog dang /
T02D2737:124b-48: byu ru bcag pa'i mtshams ltar gsal ba /
T02D2737:125a-0: @125a * // rgyan spangs pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs can /
T02D2737:125a-1: mgul pa dang bcas par byung ba /
T02D2737:125a-3: phyag gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
T02D2737:125a-4: g-yas dang po phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02D2737:125a-5: g-yon pa na gser gyi padma rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2737:125a-6: g-yas gsum pas yi dags skom pa sel ba /
T02D2737:125a-7: g-yon gsum pas ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2737:125a-9: g-yon bzhin pas mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D2737:125a-10: lhag ma dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams
T02D2737:125a-11: kyis mchog sbyin pa phyag padma'i 'dab ma ltar 'jam
T02D2737:125a-12: pa 'di lta bu rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2737:125a-13: de nas rang gi snying ga'i padma dang zla ba
T02D2737:125a-14: la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge gnas pa
T02D2737:125a-15: las byung ba'i 'od kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
T02D2737:125a-17: yang dag par mchod la bdag gi nang du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2737:125a-18: de nas sku gsung thugs legs par gnas pas dbang bskur ba'i thar thug par bsgrub po //
T02D2737:125a-19: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar padma dang zla
T02D2737:125a-20: ba la gnas pa'i sa bon kun nas dkar po
T02D2737:125a-21: 'od dang bcas pa mgo gyen du 'greng ba bsams
T02D2737:125a-22: te / de las byung ba'i sku rnams 'phros pas
T02D2737:125a-23: 'khor lo'i rnam par byung bar bsam zhing bsgom mo
T02D2737:125a-24: te / // gang gi tshe skyo ba na sa
T02D2737:125a-25: bon gyi yi ge yid la 'dzin pas nor bu'i
T02D2737:125a-26: mtshams su phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas pa'i mngon du
T02D2737:125a-33: pra tsa li pra tsa li ku su me ku su me /
T02D2737:125a-34: ba re ai li mi li tsi ti dzva lam aa pa na ye sva h'a /
T02D2737:125a-35: zhes bya ba 'dod pa bzhin bzlas so/ skyo bar
T02D2737:125a-36: gyur na ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhugs pa
T02D2737:125a-37: la mchod do // gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2737:125a-39: gshegs par mkhyen par bya ba'i phyir ja hi zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2737:125a-40: langs nas mchod ston la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2737:125a-41: 'dir gang dag de snyed kyi phyag rgya dag dmigs par mi nus pas phyag brgyad pa'am /
T02D2737:125a-43: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang bsam zhing phyag gnyis pa padma dang mchog sbyin par blta'o//
T02D2737:125b-0: @125b sgrub thabs cho ga bkod pa yis //
T02D2737:125b-1: dge ba gang zhig dri med ni //
T02D2737:125b-2: bdag gis bsags des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2737:125b-3: srid mtsho'i pha rol 'gro bar shog /'phags pa spyan
T02D2737:125b-4: ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
T02D2737:125b-5: / dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2737:125b-7: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
